Title: Untitled (Great Leap Forward banner)
Notes: A small banner from a set, celebrating the Great Leap Forward. Freighters, junks, speedboats and other vessels are rushing towards a lighthouse with a red star, with the text "Work hard, strive for the upper reaches, and build socialism as quickly, efficiently, and economically as possible!" (鼓足干劲，力争上游，多快好省地建设社会主义！) in its lightbeam.
